text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Right. All that's needed to bump employment stats upward is to get states w/ spiking COVID-19 infections to stay open or reopen because trump bullies them. So you get your "employment numbers" you want to get your sad asses reelected, while killing off Americans. Go to hell.
